nodes.label: Draw animals in their habitats with labels (e.g., fish in water).
Bear near a river labeled 'bear' and 'river'
Bird in a tree with a nest labeled 'bird', 'tree', and 'nest'
Fish swimming in a pond labeled 'fish' and 'pond'
Rabbit in a meadow labeled 'rabbit' and 'meadow'
Flowers and bees interaction (not all flowers labeled)
Habitat drawing displays varied natural environments
Correctly labeled bear and river indicate understanding of mammal habitats
Correctly labeled bird, tree, and nest show understanding of bird needs
Correctly labeled fish and pond reflect understanding of aquatic habitats
Correctly labeled rabbit and meadow indicates land habitat understanding
Partial labeling suggests incomplete understanding of all elements
Consider checking all labels for completeness to ensure clarity
